args.natural_language_statement: Suppose that the series ∑ a_n converges absolutely and ∑ b_n converges. Define c_n = ∑_{k=0}^n a_k b_{n-k}. Show that the series ∑ c_n converges and its sum equals the product of the sums of ∑ a_n and ∑ b_n. Save it to: jirilebl_ra_ch-seq-ser_4256.lean
